summary: This code navigates into the "GPT2-NewsTitle" directory and creates a new directory named "output_dir". It then runs the Python script "train.py" to train a GPT-2 model for generating news titles or covers.

details.comment: This code navigates into the "GPT2-NewsTitle" directory and creates a new directory named "output_dir". It then runs the Python script "train.py" to train a GPT-2 model for generating news titles or covers.
details.content:
cd GPT2-NewsTitle
mkdir output_dir
python3 train.py
